title: League just crashes as soon as I'm in game.
body: So I've repaired and updated all my drivers, run leagues repair function in the patcher, done a system restore, uninstalled and reinstaled league, done another repair check with the patcher, restored my video cards to default and dobe just about every other thing I can think of including safe and compatability modes on my PC. After I get in game it freezes and completely crashes my computer. The longest I've sustained a game so far is about 10 minutes but it always crashes the game and my computer freezing it to the point that I have to hold down my power button. It was working perfectly until about 2 days ago and I'm not really sure what changed over night to make it stop functioning. I've lost LP and am in leaver queue. Please help. I just want to play league.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may have installed the Windows 10 Anniversary update recently, which enabled the Xbox Game DVR feature by default. I suggest [disabling this feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes.

Let me know if you continue to see this issue.
You are a godsend. You are the best ever. You made league functional again.
